title: Display CBM and Weight KPIs as One Combined Component
steps: [1] Open the dashboard and locate the utilisation metrics component
expected_results: [1] Both KPIs (CBM, Weight) should appear side by side in one visual container

title: Calculate Average CBM Utilisation Correctly
steps: [1] Compare displayed value with Σ(Job CBM Utilisation / Total CBM Capacity)
expected_results: [1] CBM KPI shows the correct average value

title: Calculate Average Weight Utilisation Correctly
steps: [1] Compare displayed value with Σ(Job Weight Utilisation / Total Weight Capacity)
expected_results: [1] Weight KPI shows the correct average value

title: Display Positive Comparison in Green
steps: [1] Switch to 7 Days, compare with previous

title: Display Negative Comparison in Red
steps: [1] Switch to 7 Days, compare with previous

title: Date Picker and Preset Filters Update Data
expected_results: [1] KPI and graph data update based on selected time

title: Custom Period Comparison Logic
steps: [1] Compare values with equivalent prior duration
expected_results: [1] % change reflects custom duration vs prior and is color-coded properly

title: Render Line Chart for Both Metrics Over Time
steps: [1] Load the widget and observe graph
expected_results: [1] Graph should display trends for both CBM and Weight lines with distinct colors

title: X-Axis Should Represent Dates Proportionately
expected_results: [1] Dates should match selected period range with proportional intervals

title: Tooltip on Graph Should Show Date and Value
expected_results: [1] Tooltip appears with correct date and metric value
